name: ibmiotf
description: A library for developing device and application clients for IBM Watson IoT Platform

0.1.0.name: ibmiotf
0.1.0.description: A library for developing device and application clients for IBM Internet of Things Foundation

0.1.1.name: ibmiotf
0.1.1.description: A library for developing device and application clients for IBM Internet of Things Foundation

0.2.0.name: ibmiotf
0.2.0.description: A library for developing device and application clients for IBM Internet of Things Foundation

scripts.build:min: browserify src/iotf-client.js -t babelify -s IBMIoTF | uglifyjs > dist/iotf-client-bundle.min.js
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:bundle && npm run build:min
